name: @valueflows/vf-graphql-monorepo
description: ValueFlows reference GraphQL spec, authored in GraphQL SDL; plus validator methods for apps wishing to adhere to the spec.

scripts.publish: bun run publish:lib && bun run publish:mock-client
scripts.start: bun --bun run dev:schema & bun --bun run dev:demoUI
scripts.clean: rm -Rf node_modules; rm -Rf mock-server/node_modules; rm -Rf lib/node_modules; rm -Rf tests/node_modules; rm -Rf mock-client/node_modules; cd lib && bun run clean

author: vf-graphql team & contributors
